name: Blood of Patriots
description: Now with Nancy Pelosi! Choose from 18 patriots (and tyrants) and fight your way through the tree of liberty. Are you the patriot that is going to save the republic?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 (2GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: On Board
